Row.Text: [LIST][LI]Defeating an enemy Unit provides [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] [B]Happiness [/B]equal to [B]50% [/B]of its [B]Combat Strength[/B].[LI]Reduced cost to purchase [B]Suebi[/B] for each [B]Fishing/Farming[/B] town.[/LIST]

[LIST][LI]Defeating an enemy Unit provides [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] [B]Happiness [/B]equal to [B]50% [/B]of its [B]Combat Strength[/B].[LI]Reduced cost to purchase [B]Suebi[/B] for each [B]Fishing/Farming[/B] town.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Mausoleum of Theodoric[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Germania's associated Wonder.
